filter.description:
The collection items filter requires a special format.
Use "," for multiple allowed values.  Use ";" for multiple fields.
See the filter guide for more options and examples about this format.

q.description: The partial search of the text fields.

expand.description: Expand response to get full related object instead of ID.  See the expand guide for more info.

fields.description: Limit the returned fields to the list specified, separated by comma.  Note that id is always returned.

sort.description: The collection items sort field and order (prefix with "-" for descending sort).
